original_text: Now when it was day, they did not recognize the land, but they noticed a bay with a beach, on which they planned if possible to run the ship ashore.
korean_text: 날이 새매 어느 땅인지 알지 못하나 경사진 해안으로 된 항만이 눈에 띄거늘 배를 거기에 들여다 댈 수 있는가 의논한 후

sentences.original_text: they did not recognize the land
but they noticed a bay with a beach
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 해변이 있는 만을 발견했다

sentences.original_text: if possible to run the ship ashore
